topic.title: Raspberry Pi, Tor, ZeroNet
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: latest
  * Operating system: Raspbian
  * Web browser: X
  * Tor status: not available
  * Opened port: yes
  * Special configuration: X

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
https://old.reddit.com/r/zeronet/comments/7jss11/is_there_a_guide_for_tor_for_zeronet_on_raspberry
Setting up Tor through ZN on Raspberry Pi does not seem to work. This post is a little more than a year old but it still applies now and searching online for anything relevant to this topic does not seem to come up with any results.

#### Steps to reproduce:
Described in the post above

#### Observed Results:
Described in the post above -- Tor not working

#### Expected Results:
Tor to work through the ZN



Possibly, an official documentation/guide to set up Tor to work through ZN on the Raspberry Pi would work.
